    • 方法详细资料

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • cleanDirectory

        private void cleanDirectory()
        Clear the files in directories data/output/log

      • readParameter

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> readParameter(java.lang.String path)
        Obtain the parameters
        参数:
        path - The location of the parameter file
        返回:
        The map containing all the parameters and value

      • separate

        private void separate(int impressStandard,
            int searchStandard,
            java.lang.String category,
            java.lang.String pathExtract)
        Separate the necessary part from the extract file
        参数:
        impressStandard - The smallest number of impress
        searchStandard - The smallest number of search
        category - Song/Artist/Album/suggest
        pathExtract - The location of the extract file

      • createDataSet

        private void createDataSet(int expand,
                 boolean lenCord,
                 boolean queryNorm,
                 boolean useQstructure,
                 java.lang.String path,
                 java.lang.String clickPath)
        Generate the data set we use to generate ARFF file and this data set can be used to do something else
        参数:
        expand - Number of expansion of sub-query
        lenCord - Not clear
        queryNorm - It is true, the model is not linear; so generally we set it false
        useQstructure - Not clear but set it true as always
        path - The file containing query and click rate
        clickPath - The file containing all the click rate

      • generateARFF

        private void generateARFF(int factor,
                int threshold,
                java.lang.String allWord,
                java.lang.String allData,
                java.lang.String allScoreMax)
        Generate the ARFF file which can be analyzed by WEKA
        参数:
        factor - Enlarging factor
        threshold - Minimum number of the result of a query
        allWord - Word file
        allData - Data file
        allScoreMax - MaxScore file

      • learn

        private void learn(java.lang.String online)
        Generate the weights for online use by WEKA
        参数:
        online - Online weight file
